properties.name: logging.structured.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable structured logging library

properties.name: logging.structured.application-name
properties.description: Application name to include in logs. Defaults to spring.application.name

properties.name: logging.structured.request.max-body-size
properties.description: Maximum body size to log in bytes

properties.name: logging.structured.request.exclude-patterns
properties.description: URL patterns to exclude from request logging

properties.name: logging.structured.request.include-patterns
properties.description: URL patterns to include for request logging

properties.name: logging.structured.application.include-stack-trace
properties.description: Include stack trace in error logs

properties.name: logging.structured.masked-headers
properties.description: Headers to mask in logs for security

properties.name: logging.structured.masked-fields
properties.description: Fields to mask in request/response body

properties.name: logging.structured.mask-value
properties.description: Value to use when masking sensitive data
